game.name: USFIV: Arcade Challengers Pack (2011)
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: All alternate costumes for Yun, Yang, Evil Ryu, and Oni are included in this pack. Make the newest challengers stand out from the pack with these slick outfits!
game.shortDescriptionEn: All alternate costumes for Yun, Yang, Evil Ryu, and Oni are included in this pack. Make the newest challengers stand out from the pack with these slick outfits!
